Texte.consignes: This game is simple. You must rewrite the letters in the right order before the end of the timer. If you find the right word, you win points, and you get to try again with a new word. Be careful. If you miss, you lose half the points you have won in this game.
Texte.instruction: I N S T R U C T I O N S
Texte.texteInstruction: Write your answer in the box
